content: I think I'll start with one or two tools and see how they work for me. I've already been using Goodreads to track my progress, so I might try out one of the other tools, like Reading Challenge or BookNerd, to see if they can provide additional features or recommendations that Goodreads doesn't offer. I'll also check out some online book communities, like the ones you mentioned, to see what they're like and if they can help me stay motivated. Thanks for the suggestions!
